body.name: YOSUDA Under Desk Bike Pedal Exerciser for Home/Office Workout - Magnetic Mini Exercise Bike for Arm/Leg Exercise
body.stockDetail: Only 2 left in stock - order soon.

features: 【Smooth and Quiet Desk Cycle】YOSUDA under desk bike pedal exerciser have a high-quality samarium cobalt magnet that provides ample load for smoother, quieter pedaling. You can focus on your work (reply emails, read books, watch TV, etc.) without bothering your coworkers/ family members.

【Low Impact Mini Exercise Bike】Stationary bike pedals for desk is low impact so it is great on joints. It is not only designed for office white-collar, but also for the elderly, sports injured people, rehabilitation to do physical therapy to relieves pain, restores and maintains motor function.

【8 Adjustable Resistance】YOSUDA desk cycle bike pedal exerciser comes with 8 adjustable levels of magnetic tension, you can adjust resistance based on your needs. 22 pounds weight, 4 anti-slip rubber pads, it is stable enough to keep in place even under the greatest resistance level.

【Easy to Use and Store】21.26*12.28*14.37inche. Appropriate height for under desk Pedder. The easy-read big monitor tracks the Time/ Distance/ Speed/ Calories. ALSO, mini cycle exercise bike comes with a portable handle that makes it easy to carry and store, anytime, anywhere.

【What You Get】A YOSUDA mini exercise bike, all tools, and instructions are in the package. 100% satisfaction Customer Service Support and ONE YEAR FREE parts replacement. If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to contact us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: YOSUDA Pedal Exersicer About YOSUDA YOSUDA has always been the concept of fashion fitness, producing quality fitness equipment products. Each product has been carefully designed by the R&D team to strictly control the manufacturing process and provide excellent products. We believe everyone should develop a habit of fitness. Whether you are outside or indoors, whether you are a fitness enthusiast, a white collar or a housewife, you can find fitness methods and products that are right for you. Keeping fit from YOSUDA. The Benefits of YOSUDA Under Desk Bike Keep Fit From YOSUDA According to a scientific study,people who exercise before or during work are happier, suffer less stress, and are more productive.Therefore,the under desk bike was invented.In addition to helping seniors with reduced mobility improve their health and extend their lifespan, mini cycle allows people to exercise under their desks while working and learning. Compared to other mini exercise bike,YOSUDA has the following advantages Magnet-driven,no friction with flywheel.Incredibly quiet and smooth. 8 Levels resistances to control the intensity of your workout. Compact design for using under the desk and saving your space. Allowing forward and reverse training.Can be used for legs and arms Sturdy ABS frame with anti-slip pads to keep you safe.

Features Space Saving Under Desk Bike Exercise bike pedal (L 21.26*W 12.29*H 10.95 inches) taking up very little of your space.Perfect for small apartments, dorm rooms, or the office.It can be easily taken to anywhere as offices, rehabilitation centers with a portable handle. Ideal for Legs and Arms Workout This portable exercise bike helps exercise your arms and legs in a forward or revise motion. It is excellent for increasing blood circulation,reducing joint pain, improving body muscular endurance,and losing weight. Produces Sound Below 20DB Magnetic mini cycle provides smooth, quiet pedal motion. Pedalling the bike produces sound below 20DB.No disturbing your colleague or interfering with baby sleeping or listening to music while exercising. Easy Assembly Within 10Mins Quick and easy assembly within 10minutes.All tools are included. Take the stationary bike pedal out of the box -just a few screws and you’re done! Perfects for people who are not good at assembling huge fitness equipments.

Features Multi-Function LCD Display The easy-to-read LCD display on the mini pedal excerciser shows your time, speed, distance, and calories burned to keep you motivated as you cycling.Or choose the scan function to cycle through all workout variables. 8 Magnetic Resistance Levels Use the tension knob to select resistance to adjust and control the intensity of your workout to fit your specific needs. Superb mini exercise bike fits for physical therapy,relaxation,body building,aerobic exercise,etc. Sturdy Stability and No Sliding Four non-slip rubber pads and two wider base tubes make this mini cycle anti-skid and accident-free. 22lbs in weight,ABS and steel frame ensure not wobbling back and forth. Fixed Nut and Adjustable Strap Our pedals are reinforced with extra screws to keep them from falling off.Wide adjustable straps fit feet of different sizes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made, quiet, good price.
reviews.reviewText: Light in weight, easy to assemble. Use it daily for leg and upper body exercises. Constructed well, very quiet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Little Buddy
reviews.reviewText: Part of my "at home" physical therapy. I love my bike pedal exerciser. It is helping me recuperate. It has helped me get stronger in both my legs and my arms. It has different speeds and strengths, but I am still in first gear.But every day I feel stronger, and that's half of the battle back to being strong and healthy again. How you feel, and this thing makes me feel, like I am going to do it.It not only helps your legs, but also works to strengthen your arms. It is a heavy machine, and you may need help getting it up on a table. But if you have someone that can do that for you, it works just as well for your arms, as it does for your legs.It was easy to put together. And easy to operate. It has changed my life, and it can change yours too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Seems nice, pretty well made and quiet but directions could use a lot more details.
reviews.reviewText: Operates smoothly (we did oil one of the pedals - it was kind of clicky). It's quiet. Tension seems to work well. I can definitely feel the difference in the tension from level1 to 4 to 8. The assembly is not difficult, but there are things that I had to ask my resident mechanical expert. For example, which way do the legs go a) smooth side up or b) smooth side down - answer a) smooth side up with recessed dimple side down so bolt head is in the hole and doesn't scratch the floor. Which side up on the pedals when you attach the straps. The front of the pedal has more curves, so attach straps with that edge away from you. Then when you hand pedal it's got places for each finger and is way more comfortable. Even though the small leg and where it attaches on the frame were both labeled front, the small leg goes closer to the person and the larger leg goes more toward the front. Must be a translation issue. Overall, I'm hopeful that this will be used by the elder who needs it. It looks like it will work nicely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Completely satisfied with this great product! Worth every penny!
reviews.reviewText: I could not be happier with this piece of exercise equipment.Delivery: Packaged very well, all parts were there, in nice polished condition. Parts were solid, heavy metal. My wife put it together in about fifteen minutes with no issues. An extra bolt was included but not needed.Operation: Machine runs extremely smoothly with a very satisfying feeling - in other words, it feels good to pedal it. Almost no noise. The handle is a great idea, and makes it very easy to move the machine from one place to another.Storage: Machine is very compact, especially considering it can be used for both arms and legs (both of which exercise core muscles as well). A stationary bike, nordic track, rowing machine, etc. while giving the same benefits, would require a lot more space.Purpose: My wife's 71 y.o. knees are (literally) on their last legs - she's trying to stay in shape while staving off knee surgery as long as possible. She tried a treadmill and a rowing machine: both left her unable to walk after 10 minutes of walking/rowing. You should have seen the smile on her face after trying this pedal exerciser for the first time, using her arms! (I can do it! I can do it! She practically danced around the room.) After 10 minutes, she was glistening with sweat and breathing hard - so, obviously getting a workout.Thank you, Yosuda, for making a quality product at a good price!Regarding the pedal threads: Come on, people! Read the directions! The pedals are threaded differently, so they won't unscrew themselves in use. Any kid who has worked on a bike knows that. Yosuda went to a lot of trouble to try to make that clear, in the directions and by labelling the parts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A bit heavy
reviews.reviewText: I bought this thinking I could take it with me to work, but it was way to heavy to carry. My husband keeps it under his desk instead at home. It is heavy duty, and works really well, just isn't easily transported anywhere. The main problem is just trying to maneuver your body under the desk in a way that you won't hit your legs when pedaling. Once you figure out the position, it works well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must for those with a sitting job!
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my hubby for Christmas. He loves it! It assembled easily, and within a few minutes he was trying it out. It is quiet, and the pad that came with it helps prevent it from moving when being used. For those who have to sit at a desk, it is highly recommended for keeping the blood flowing. It is very convenient for office use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Seems to be well made, but.....
reviews.reviewText: I have tried several of the highly rated under desk cycle exercisers & have determined that they are all lacking! My requirement is that the flywheel be free spinning. Meaning that it is not directly connected to the crank. This gives a very natural feel to pedaling & makes exercising much more enjoyable. This unit, along with the others I tried, Have the crank directly connected to the flywheel so you can't stop pedaling without stopping the flywheel. My recumbent exercycle has the free spinning flywheel & I can stop pedaling & then start again & independent of the flywheel motion. It keeps spinning. I hope someday to find a small cycle machine that incorporates this feature.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024

reviews.reviewText: This is a solid well built indoor exercise machine. We use it daily in the winter time and haven’t had any problems with it. At first I found that it slid along the floor when pedaling but now I position it against a step and it works well. We’re very satisfied with it!

Really perfect for me. I have averaged about 50 miles per day and have lost 4 pounds in one week. Really well built and totally silent. I'm 5'8 and I do have to sit in a low chair but it works well and I do computer work and talk on the phone while burning about 1000 calories a day! You can't beat that. I was looking at more expensive solutions but I won't look anymore. Completely satisfied.

positive: good exercise bike; easy to assemble, very very quiet, stable on carpet surface, pedal forward and backward, develop sweating after 5 min.negative: could not use under desk; my desk is 73.6 cm high (29 inch) and i am only 157 cm (5'2") and my knees were hitting the desk, not easy to read the display, the blue back light on the display never lit, the provided batteries do not last long and be careful when changing the batteries, one felt in the device and not been able to retrieve it yet.

The media could not be loaded. This under desk bike pedal exerciser have a high-quality samarium cobalt magnet that provides ample load for smoother, quieter pedaling. You can focus on your work easily. It is compact and easy to storage and doesn’t take too much of space. Suitable for ppl who don’t have time and are not motive enough to go for running. You can exercise efficiently while working. It has 8 adjustable stages.

reviews.reviewTitle: The perfect bike for my mother.
reviews.reviewText: Please send over the bike once we got the replacement pedal from the support team, which came fairly quickly. And ever since, my mother has been using it faithfully to exercise her knee in preparation for surgery, as well as on the table top to strengthen her upper body. It’s a great little unit, very sturdy and well-made, and the product support team is excellent. The bike is made to last.
